data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (average_memory_pressure IS NULL OR average_memory_pressure < 85) AND (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (memory_utilization IS NULL OR memory_utilization < 85) AND (target_memory_pressure_average IS NULL OR target_memory_pressure_average < 85)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine FACET microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine_name) AS 'Virtual Machines' FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine FACET microsoft_hyperv_host_name

presentation.title: Host Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Host of this Virtual Machine

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: CPU Usage of the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_utilization) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of memory used on the Virtual Machine

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_disk_latency) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Disk Latency (Microseconds)
presentation.notes: Average Disk Latency for all disks on the Virtual Machine

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_normalized_iops) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Normalized IOPS (per Second)
presentation.notes: Average Normalized IOPS for all disks on the Virtual Machine

data.nrql: SELECT sum(total_disk_usage) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Disk Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Total percentage of all storage used that is attached to the Virtual Machine

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_memory_pressure) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Memory Pressure (Percent)
presentation.notes: This is a calculation of how much memory the VM wants divided by the amount of memory the VM currently has and then multiplied by 100.

data.nrql: SELECT average(inbound_traffic_rate) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Inbound Traffic (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: Inbound traffic to the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(outbound_traffic_rate) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Outbound Traffic (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: Outbound traffic from the Virtual Machine.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_demand) FROM microsoft_hyperv_virtual_machine COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Demand (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Memory demanded by this Virtual Machine.
